name: Lever Seeker
description:
Description:

You must reach out and look for TWO levers on each level. This game becomes more difficult and challenging on each level, many obstacles await you at each level. This game matches the theme (two) because your job in this game is to find and reach 2 levers that I'm sure you can't achieve. Good luck in the challenging adventure of this platformer game.

Control:

[A] [D] -> To move Right or Left
[W]/[Space] -> To Jump (Double click to double jump)

Credits:

Tileset : https://0x72.itch.io/
Lever Sound And Walking Sound : (Kenney) www.kenney.nl
Laser Effect Sound : K.L.Jonasson, Winnipeg, Canada. Triki Minut Interactive www.trikiminut.com
8-Bit Jump Effect : Jesús Lastra

Created with Godot Engine
